overview: Live 1976 is a live video by the American hard rock band Blue Öyster Cult, released in 1991 in Europe by Castle Communications on VHS, 15 years after the recording that is on the tape. It was recorded at the Capital Centre in Largo, Maryland on December 27, 1976 using the in-house video system. The concert was also released as a live album on CD, with the same track listing.  Set List: Stairway To The Stars, Harvester Of Eyes, Cities On Flame, ME 262, Dominance And Submission, Astronomy, Buck's Boogie, This Ain't The Summer Of Love, Born To Be Wild, Don't Fear The Reaper.
title: Blue Öyster Cult: Live 1976
